movie_title: Amazon Hears Everything You Say to Your Echo: Why You Should Care
introduction:

vocabulary.definition: the gradual destruction or reduction of something
vocabulary.example: Every erosion of privacy compromises our personal data security.

vocabulary.definition: close observation, especially of a suspected spy or criminal
vocabulary.example: The government's surveillance program raised concerns about privacy invasion.

vocabulary.definition: the quality of being coherent and intelligible
vocabulary.example: The instructions should be written with clarity to avoid confusion.
She fell for an online scam promising easy money.

vocabulary.definition: confess to be true or to be the case
vocabulary.example: He admits that he made a mistake in the report.

vocabulary.definition: exposing to danger, suspicion, or disrepute
vocabulary.example: The leaked information compromises national security.
